name: Rangers vs Laser!!
description:
How to play

You need to defeat rangers before they reach your tower. Each rangers can be killed by laser that got the same color as they are. You will be provided with 3 lasers Red Green and Blue. You  can change direction of your laser using "Prism tower".
When lasers hit each other they will combine colors and become new color. 

Red + Blue =  Purple
Red + Green = Yellow
Green + Blue = Light blue
Yellow + Purple = White
Yellow + Light blue = White
Light blue+ Purple = White
*Play in full screen for better experience*

Story

We are EDMLASER! Alien from HueSaeng Planet.  We come to conquer the earth with EDM and Laser but the Rangers are trying to stop us. We will show them the power of RGB LASER! When the lasers combined ,No Rangers can stood in our way No matter what color they are.

Objective

you need to SURVIVE rounds of enemy (RANGERS)

Tutorial

Left Click : Select, Place Tower
Right Click : Sell Tower
Scroll Mouse : To rotate tower before you place it
